title: A Tenderfoot in Tombstone, the Private Journal of George Whitwell Parksons: The Turbulent Years, 1880-82
description: A Tenderfoot in The Private Journal of George Whitwell The Turbulent Years, 1880-82 (Great West & Indians Series, Volume 65), edited by Lynn R. Bailey. 1996 paperback published by Westernlore Press, Tucson.
author: George W. Parsons
